      • send

        <T,U> CompletableFuture<U> send(T message)
        Sends a message to the member.

        Messages are sent using a topic based messaging system over the configured cluster protocol. If no handler is registered for the given topic on the given member, the returned CompletableFuture will be failed. If the member successfully receives the message and responds, the returned CompletableFuture will be completed with the member's response.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The message type.
        U - The response type.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send. The message type will be used for the topic. Messages will be serialized using the configured resource serializer.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the message response.

      • send

        <T,U> CompletableFuture<U> send(Class<? super T> type,
                                T message)
        Sends a message to the member.

        Messages are sent using a topic based messaging system over the configured cluster protocol. If no handler is registered for the given topic on the given member, the returned CompletableFuture will be failed. If the member successfully receives the message and responds, the returned CompletableFuture will be completed with the member's response.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The message type.
        U - The response type.
        Parameters:
        type - The message type.
        message - The message to send. The message type will be used for the topic. Messages will be serialized using the configured resource serializer.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the message response.

      • send

        <T,U> CompletableFuture<U> send(String topic,
                                T message)
        Sends a message to the member.

        Messages are sent using a topic based messaging system over the configured cluster protocol. If no handler is registered for the given topic on the given member, the returned CompletableFuture will be failed. If the member successfully receives the message and responds, the returned CompletableFuture will be completed with the member's response.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The message type.
        U - The response type.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic on which to send the message.
        message - The message to send. Messages will be serialized using the configured resource serializer.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the message response.

      • execute

        CompletableFuture<Void> execute(Task<Void> task)
        Executes a task on the member.
        Parameters:
        task - The task to execute.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the task has been executed.

      • submit

        <T> CompletableFuture<T> submit(Task<T> task)
        Submits a task to the member, returning a future to be completed with the remote task result.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The task return type.
        Parameters:
        task - The task to submit to the member.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the task result.
